AdminUser.title: Admin User
AdminUser.description: Represents a user with admin privileges. The existence of a document with the user's UID in the /admins collection grants admin rights.

grantedAt.description: The date and time admin rights were granted.

createdAt.description: The date and time the user profile was created.

WordList.title: Word List
WordList.description: A collection of words for a user to study.

name.description: The name of the word list.

description.description: A description of the word list.

createdAt.description: The date and time the word list was created.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this list.

isPublic.description: Whether the word list is public and accessible to all users.

Word.title: Word
Word.description: A single vocabulary word within a word list. This entity does not contain user-specific progress.

UserWordProgress.title: User Word Progress
UserWordProgress.description: Tracks a specific user's learning progress for a single word.

masteryLevel.description: The user's mastery level of the word (0-5).

lastReviewed.description: The date and time the word was last reviewed by the user.

mistakeCount.description: How many times the user has made a mistake on this word.

testCount.description: How many times the user has been tested on this word.

Badge.title: Badge
Badge.description: Represents an achievable badge in the system.

icon.description: The name of the Lucide icon for the badge.

UserBadge.title: User Badge
UserBadge.description: Represents a badge earned by a user. The document ID is the badge ID.

earnedOn.description: The date and time the badge was earned.

/admins/{userId}.description: Stores a list of admin user UIDs. The existence of a document signifies admin privileges.

/users/{userId}/wordProgress/{wordId}.description: Sub-collection storing a user's progress for specific words. The wordId is the global ID of the word from a word list.

/users/{userId}/badges/{badgeId}.description: Sub-collection storing badges a user has earned. The document ID corresponds to a badge in the global badge list.

/wordLists/{wordListId}.description: Top-level collection of all word lists, queryable by ownerId or isPublic.

/wordLists/{wordListId}/words/{wordId}.description: Sub-collection of words within a specific word list.
